name: RGBCELLS
description:
RGBCELLS is a Puzzle Game .
Your goal is to unlock all the Cells' color .

Use the Big RGB Bar to scan ,
Red + Green = Yellow
Red + Blue = Violet
Green + Blue = Cyan
What's the cell's color ?
Then use the Small Color Bar to confirm your guess .

In the style of Minesweeper .

▪ Custom Levels (∞)
▪ Steam Achievement

(The Game won't end if you make the wrong decision, but I hope you don't use the Exhaustion to play)

- Trading Card Coming Soon (Enabled if qualify)

Powered by Unity 2D.
